snippet.title: Marins Dream Garden, Farming Game X 3D Platformer
snippet.description:
Made for Ludum Dare 51

One night, after a long day planting fruit and vegetables in their garden Marin fell asleep while thinking about how long they would have to wait to enjoy the fruits(and veg) of their labour. That night they had a very strange dream. They woke up on an island floating in the void. A beautiful soft voice spoke to Marin, saying "Hello Marin, my name is Astella, the spirit of every wish upon a star that has ever been made. I saw how hard you worked today in the garden and wanted to give you a dream where all your work pays off. Time here is sped up, a day will pass by every 10 seconds, plants only take a week to grow and you can eat all the fruit and veg you like! Stay a while, life's short but dreams are forever."

Play Marins Dream Garden at https://boaheck.itch.io/dream-garden
